  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.workspace.AbstractUITask

    public abstract class AbstractUITask
extends Object
implements UITask
    Base class for UITask.

        Description copied from interface: UITask
        Create a component that displays a brief description of the task. This is optional and can be null.

      • getActions

        public List<Action> getActions()
        Get optional actions associated with this task. These may be displayed by the UITaskManager.

        It is recommended that Workspace and UITaskManager implementations call this after calling UITask.createTaskInformationComponent(LocaleContext) and UITask.createTaskUI(LocaleContext).

        Returns an empty list.
        Specified by:
        getActions in interface UITask
        Returns:
        optional list of actions. Return an empty list if not supported.

        Returns:
        the identifier.

      • getIdentifier

        public String getIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: UITask

        Specified by:

      • getLabelClassname

        public String getLabelClassname()
        Description copied from interface: UITask
        Get the label classname.

        This may be called multiple times - in cases where the UITaskManager may think there is an opportunity for the task information to change.

        Specified by:
        getLabelClassname in interface UITask
        Returns:
        the label classname. May be null.

      • supportsSerializaton

        public boolean supportsSerializaton()
        Description copied from interface: UITask
        Return true or false if the UITask implementation supports serialization for the purpose of saving and restoring the user's task list.
        Specified by:
        supportsSerializaton in interface UITask
        Returns:
        true or false. If true, the implementation must implement Serializable or Externalizable.
